mapper.select: SELECT ROW_NUMBER()OVER(ORDER BY (CONVERT(int,ZDNum))) AS RN,PertainEW,PertainEWCode FROM ( select * from MXRoadList ) AS qd

SELECT RN,TEMP.* FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER()OVER(ORDER BY (select 0)) AS RN,* FROM ( select * from [GPSROAD] where Replace(Replace(substring(roadcode,1,LEN(roadcode)-6),'T','S'),'H','G')=#{roadcode} ) AS qd) TEMP
